Hero.subtitle: For over 10 years, we have been delivering reliable software solutions for public administration, geodesy, and the private sector across Bosnia and Herzegovina.

Products.subtitle: Integrated software packages designed to automate your business processes, reduce costs, and increase efficiency.

WhyUs.heading: Information technology for modern age
WhyUs.description1: iT SYSTEMS specializes in design, development, and maintenance of business software. As a system integrator, we offer comprehensive IT solutions tailored for the modern age.
WhyUs.description2: Our business philosophy is built on a "customer first" approach. We focus on quality and long-term support, offering the optimal balance of price and functionality in the local market.

Geodet.heading: Geodet
Geodet.description: The leading application for automatic processing of geodetic data in BiH. Generate standard geodetic forms and transform coordinates in seconds.

f1.title: Instrument support
f1.description: Seamless integration for Topcon, Leica, Sokkia, Trimble, Nikon, and Ruide devices.

f2.title: Automatic forms
f2.description: Generate TZ, O1i2, O1v, O8, O25 forms directly in Excel format.

f3.title: CAD Integration
f3.description: Export to AutoCAD, ZWCAD, BricsCAD, MicroStation, and Google Earth.

pricing.heading: Choose your plan
pricing.subtitle: Flexible licensing options with volume discounts available.

ctaBanner.heading: Ready to modernize your geodetic processes?

GeodetProfili.heading: Geodet Profiles
GeodetProfili.description: Specialized application for visualization and drawing of geodetic terrain profiles. Flexible data import from various sources with professional profile generation.

f1.title: Profile visualization
f1.description: Generation of longitudinal and cross profiles with automatic dimensioning and legend.

f2.title: Flexible import
f2.description: Support for data import from Geodet application, ASCII files, and Topcon and Leica formats.

f3.title: Result export
f3.description: Export profiles to DXF, PDF, and Excel formats for further processing and presentation.

pricing.heading: Choose your plan
pricing.subtitle: Flexible licensing options with volume discounts available.

ProMan.heading: ProMan
ProMan.description: Electronic protocol and document management system. Centralize your archive, automate business processes, and track document flow in real time.

f1.title: Electronic protocol
f1.description: Automatic registration, classification, and tracking of documents with unique protocol numbers.

f2.title: Central archive
f2.description: Digital archive of all documents with advanced search by content, date, and category.

f3.title: Process management
f3.description: Define workflows, automatic notifications, and track task status across your team.

ctaBanner.heading: Ready to digitize your document management?

DkvPro.heading: DKV-PRO
DkvPro.description: Professional software package for power line and overhead line design. Electromechanical calculations, route profiling, and technical documentation generation.

f1.title: Electromechanical calculations
f1.description: Automatic calculations of mechanical stress, conductor sag, and ground wire per standards.

f2.title: Route profiling
f2.description: Visualization and optimization of power line routes with automatic tower positioning.

f3.title: Technical documentation
f3.description: Generation of complete project documentation, assembly tables, and material specifications.

ctaBanner.heading: Ready for professional power line design?

Ervip.heading: ERVIP
Ervip.description: Complete solution for time tracking and access control. Biometric identification, automatic hour calculation, and payroll system integration.

f1.title: Biometric tracking
f1.description: Support for fingerprint, card, and PIN code with instant employee identification.

f2.title: Automatic calculation
f2.description: Calculation of regular hours, overtime, night shifts, and annual leave.

f3.title: Access control
f3.description: Management of access zones, time schedules, and security levels.

pricing.heading: Choose your plan
pricing.subtitle: Price depends on the number of terminals and employees.

ctaBanner.heading: Ready to automate your time tracking?

HelpDesk.heading: Help Desk
HelpDesk.description: Online ticketing system for efficient technical support and customer care. Track requests, manage priorities, and measure service quality in real time.

f1.title: Ticketing system
f1.description: Create, track, and resolve requests with automatic assignment to the support team.

f2.title: SLA management
f2.description: Define service levels, automatic escalations, and response time tracking.

f3.title: Customer portal
f3.description: Web portal for users with a knowledge base, FAQ section, and request status tracking.

pricing.heading: Choose your plan
pricing.subtitle: Per-agent licensing with unlimited end users.

ctaBanner.heading: Ready to improve your customer support?
